name: Polly Acres Pre Alpha 0.13
description: Polly Acres Pre Alpha is my first full game, I started work in January 2017 and plan to have a polished version out by June. Right now the game is basically in creative mode, other then the hammer witch still requires coins. But play around, find coins and build things and shoot things if you want, all Items are in the inventory by pressing the "E" key. Thats all for now!
